articles.headline: Fire Mauls Beloved Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris
articles.snippet: Video filmed by onlookers showed flames and smoke billowing from the building. The cathedral was evacuated, and the fire’s cause was not known.
articles.abstract: Video filmed by onlookers showed flames and smoke billowing from the building. The cathedral was evacuated, and the fire’s cause was not known.
articles.lead_paragraph: PARIS — Notre-Dame cathedral, the symbol of the beauty and history of Paris, was scarred by an extensive fire on Monday evening that caused its delicate spire to collapse, bruised the Parisian skies with smoke and further disheartened a city already back on its heels after weeks of violent protests.
articles.byline: By Adam Nossiter and Aurelien Breeden

articles.headline: Deutsche Bank Is Subpoenaed for Trump Records by House Democrats
articles.snippet: Subpoenas from the House’s Financial Services and Intelligence committees were the latest attempts by congressional Democrats to collect information about the finances of President Trump.
articles.abstract: Subpoenas from the House’s Financial Services and Intelligence committees were the latest attempts by congressional Democrats to collect information about the finances of President Trump.
articles.lead_paragraph: Congressional investigators on Monday intensified their pursuit of President Trump’s personal and business financial records by issuing a subpoena to his longtime lender, Deutsche Bank.
articles.byline: By Emily Flitter and David Enrich

articles.headline: A France in Turmoil Weeps for a Symbol of Paris’s Enduring Identity
articles.snippet: For centuries, Notre-Dame cathedral has enshrined an evolving notion of what it means to be French. As smoke and flames wafted into the sky on Monday, the symbolism was hard to miss.
articles.abstract: For centuries, Notre-Dame cathedral has enshrined an evolving notion of what it means to be French. As smoke and flames wafted into the sky on Monday, the symbolism was hard to miss.
articles.lead_paragraph: Notre-Dame has occupied the heart of Paris for the better part of a millennium, its twin medieval towers rising from the small central island wedged between the storied left and right banks.

articles.headline: The Rematch: Bernie Sanders vs. a Clinton Loyalist
articles.snippet: The blowup reflects ideological divisions among Democrats between a legacy Clinton organization and liberals trying to harness the energy of millennials.
articles.abstract: The blowup reflects ideological divisions among Democrats between a legacy Clinton organization and liberals trying to harness the energy of millennials.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The bad blood started early.
articles.byline: By Elizabeth Williamson and Kenneth P. Vogel

articles.headline: In Aftermath of Notre-Dame Fire, Macron Urges Unity in Fragmented Nation
articles.snippet: President Emmanuel Macron sought to rally France by turning a moment of national mourning for Notre-Dame Cathedral, which was severely damaged Monday, to his advantage.
articles.abstract: President Emmanuel Macron sought to rally France by turning a moment of national mourning for Notre-Dame Cathedral, which was severely damaged Monday, to his advantage.
articles.lead_paragraph: PARIS — President Emmanuel Macron asked French citizens on Tuesday night to come together in the aftermath of the calamitous fire at Notre-Dame Cathedral and to move beyond the divisions that have wrenched the country during months of violent street protests.

articles.headline: Donald Trump, China Savior? Some Chinese Say Yes
articles.snippet: Business leaders and intellectuals say one of Beijing’s toughest critics could force the country to change. Still needed: voices of support from the inside.
articles.abstract: Business leaders and intellectuals say one of Beijing’s toughest critics could force the country to change. Still needed: voices of support from the inside.
articles.lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump has referred to China as “our enemy.” He has called it “a major threat.” “Remember,” he once wrote on Twitter, “China is not a friend of the United States!”

articles.headline: ‘Stop Sanders’ Democrats Are Agonizing Over His Momentum
articles.snippet: Members of the party establishment who oppose Bernie Sanders have had discussions about how to handle his candidacy, while others warn of a schism within the party.
articles.abstract: Members of the party establishment who oppose Bernie Sanders have had discussions about how to handle his candidacy, while others warn of a schism within the party.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — When Leah Daughtry, a former Democratic Party official, addressed a closed-door gathering of about 100 wealthy liberal donors in San Francisco last month, all it took was a review of the 2020 primary rules to throw a scare in them.
